product_details.description: NA 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM 17.22 cm (6.78 inch) Display 64MP Rear Camera | 13MP Front Camera 5500 mAh Battery Dimensity 7300 Ultimate Processor

banner_details:
This banner features a tech-focused, modern smartphone advertisement layout with a bold and vibrant aesthetic. It consists of a dark gradient background ("background" layer) enhanced with orange-colored outlines and graphic accents like linear paths and soft circles, giving it a futuristic and premium touch. 

The main heading ("heading") and subheading ("subheading") are prominently positioned at the top left, followed by a vertically aligned product description block ("description") listing key specifications. A visually striking price label ("price") is displayed in large, bold white typeface near the bottom left. The call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") in bright orange ensures immediate user attention. 

A realistic, high-resolution smartphone image ("product_image") sits toward the right center, angled slightly for a dynamic visual presence.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #0a0a0a → #1a1a1a (Gradient)
- Text Highlight: #FFFFFF (White)
- Accent & Buttons: #FF4500 (Vibrant Orange)
- Additional Graphics: Transparent strokes and fills in orange for visual depth.
product_color: The product image uses a bold and futuristic color palette that emphasizes technology and innovation. Dominant colors include matte graphite black (#1A1A1A) for the phone body, contrasted with sharp neon orange (#FF5C00) elements for emphasis. The display showcases teal green (#00BFA6) lighting on the model's face and neon red-orange (#FF3B00) accents in the futuristic glasses for vibrant highlights. These colors blend dynamically with the deep black background (#000000), enhancing contrast and making key features stand out. For an advertisement banner, a palette of Black (#000000), Neon Orange (#FF5C00), Teal Green (#00BFA6), White (#FFFFFF), and Graphite (#1A1A1A) would create a striking visual appeal.
